author: DryRun
body: This PR fixes the crash due to castor digis in the QIE11DigiCollection, as reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/23744. It consists of backporting two commits from 10XY, f8aeac9086a41dc160e997be433fe5f2091ea48f and c3cdccbb3cb57fa622cff03295b2d9115a0276c7, which add requirements that subdet==HB for HBHEDigiCollection and subdet==HE for QIE11DigiColelction, respectively.
title: HCALDQM: Fix crash from castor digis (9_4_X)
